# @vinejs/vine

<hr>
<br />

<div align="center">
  <h3>One of the fastest validation library for Node.js</h3>
  <p>VineJS is a form data validation library for Node.js. You may use it to validate the HTTP request body in your backend applications.</p>
</div>

<br />
